item.title: Testing Hiera Data
item.description: As a puppet consultant I often run into the same problems with multiple clients. Many times I can reuse a magical script and my value instantly becomes obvious. I like to think I have things figured out, but sometimes there are just problems we as a community have not solved yet. The problem I am talking about is hiera validation. Most of us are too busy learning puppet, ruby, markdown, and git that testing is not a priority until your puppet code blows up in your face.
